about.name: MAKSYM MANKO
about.description: I am a personal trainer who doesn't lead clients blindly. My task is not just to create a plan, but to help you build a strong body and iron discipline. I customize each plan for you: goals, schedule, preferences, fitness level.
about.workWith: I work with those who want to:

goals.returnForm: get back in shape after breaks

trainingPlans.title: Structured programs. No fluff. No guesswork.
trainingPlans.description: Choose what suits you. Ready plan or personal support — everything depends on your goal and level.

ready.title: Ready plan
ready.description: Want to start right now? Choose your goal — and get a clear step-by-step plan.

individual.title: Individual plan
individual.subtitle: For you. For your rhythm. For your goal.

onlineTraining.title: Train with me from anywhere in the world.
onlineTraining.description: Buy a plan — get a system: workouts, nutrition, support, feedback. You don't just download a file — you start working with a trainer.

infoDialog.title: PRODUCT METHODOLOGY: «Body Transformation»
infoDialog.productDescription: Body mass gain course with support and feedback in telegram channel!
goals: Develop and strengthen muscles, increase their volume and strength
Achieve a healthy and aesthetic body
Enjoy workouts and don't lose motivation
Don't gain excess fat, gain mass
Learn to eat without guilt and anxiety
Formulate a clear system that will stay with you for life
includesList: Ready plan of effective workouts for a month
Access to TG channel with product basket and KBJU
infoDialog.formatDescription: The course is divided into 4 modules (1 per week), each module — video lessons, materials and assignments.
